g.text: Type a command below, or ask me anything.
The ls -la command lists all files including
hidden ones (the -a flag) with detailed info like
permissions, owner, size, and date (the -l flag).
Tip: use ls -lah for human-readable file sizes!
Git is a version control system that tracks
changes in your code. Think of it as an undo
history for your entire project. It lets you:
